title: Timeless Value of Handwriting
content: The process of handwriting is important for the cognitive developmentt of learners of all ages. Especially in children, it not only improves memory, reading ability and critical thinking, but also promotes essential motor skills. Handwriting practice sharpens fine motor control, improves hand-eye coordination and strengthens hand muscles.

title: Tracing Sheets
content: Tracing sheets have long helped children refine their handwriting by building muscle memory and control. Traces modernizes this approach for the digital era with the Apple Pencil, reducing paper waste while retaining the benefits of tracing. Future developments could include a neural network that classifies each drawing input and offers personalized handwriting suggestions, using a robust dataset to ensure effective feedback.
